views.title: Create your password manager
views.imageLeftDescription: Save here all your passwords, data or any information, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
views.imageRightDescription: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
views.subtitle: How does it work?
views.descritipion1: First, you must create a password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
views.descritipion2: For example, the number of your card, the PIN, the PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information that you need to have in a safe place.

form.labelInputForm3: Create your hint to remember your password
form.infoTextForm: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
form.passwordToolTip: A reminder of how a password was derived. In order to jog the user's memory, some login systems allow a hint to be entered, which is displayed each time the password is requested. For example, if the password contains the date of someone's birthday, one might enter the name of the person as the hint. However, password hints have to be carefully conceived; otherwise, a non-authorized user might figure it out.

errors.passwordMinLength: The Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordMaxLength: The Password must be less than 24 characters long
errors.passwordSpecialChar: The Password need at least one special character
errors.passwordHintLength: The Password hint must be less than 255 characters long
